channel.title: The Witch - Neutral Special(Unique)
channel.description:
> > [Color = white]**The Witch - Neutral Special(Unique)**[/Color] > > *(Passives)* > ***Forgotten Magic*** - After death, you can use one more debuff/Fireball at night, if you have one. > > (Day ability) > ***Confusion(2 Charges)*** - Prevent a player from making day abilities today. You can only target a player once. > > *(Night ability)* > > ***Debuff(Inf Charges)*** - Debuff a player depending on their class type. You cannot the same person twice in a row. > >Killer - If they attack tonight, their target will be granted death immunity. Offensive - Remove all of their passives, and occupy them tonight. Investgative - Their results for tonight will be *Framed* Support - Lose 1 Charge of a random ability. If there are none to chose from, Occupy them instead. Social - They cannot use any day abilities, talk, or vote tommorow. > > ***Flreball(2 charges)*** - Attack a player. > > **Goal: Defeat the [color=blue]Blue Dragon[/color] and the [color=red]Cult[/color]/[color=purple]Unseen[/color].**
Thanks for Bad English edit

item.title: The Witch - Neutral Special(Unique)
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Lastday3312:

Forgotten Magic - After death, you can use one more debuff/Fireball at night, if you have one.

So… this is much worse than anything currently in the game. Basically, you’ll need to kill the Witch almost immediately… however it can still cause problems.

Lastday3312:

Confusion(2 Charges) - Prevent a player from making day abilities today. You can only target a player once.

Would they be notified about this?

Lastday3312:

Debuff(Inf Charges) - Debuff a player depending on their class type. You cannot the same person twice in a row.

Lastday3312:

Killer - If they attack tonight, their target will be granted death immunity.

Why not just have their attack fail?

Lastday3312:

Offensive - Remove all of their passives, and occupy them tonight.

Why not just occupy them, and bypass any immunity?

Lastday3312:

Investgative - Their results for tonight will be Framed

First: *Investigative (my bad)
Second: Seems pretty good.

Lastday3312:

Support - Lose 1 Charge of a random ability. If there are none to chose from, Occupy them instead.

Will they be notified of this?

Lastday3312:

Social - They cannot use any day abilities, talk, or vote tommorow.

Tomorrow (My bad, again)

Lastday3312:

Flreball(2 charges) - Attack a player.

Fireball (I am bad at grammar too)

Lastday3312:

Goal: Defeat the Blue Dragon and the Cult/Unseen.

This seems very… odd. Like this is a Neutral Killer Wining condition. However, as it’s currently set up it would not work as a Neutral Killer.

Suggestions:

Day ability:

Neutral Aura - At the end of the night, determine if a player is Neutral (3 charges)

Read full topic

item.title: The Witch - Neutral Special(Unique)
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Lastday3312:

Forgotten Magic - After died,Can use one more debuff/Fireball(If have one) at night.

Forgotten Magic - After death, you can use one more debuff/Fireball at night, if you have one.

Lastday3312:

Confusion(2 Charges) - Will block a player’s day ability after use.(Can only target a player one time)(Not muting tho)

Confusion(2 Charges) - Prevent a player from making day abilities today. You can only target a player once.

Lastday3312:

Debuff(Inf Charges) - Debuff a player’s stats depending on their class type. (Cannot target the same person two times at a row.)

Debuff(Inf Charges) - Debuff a player depending on their class type. You cannot the same person twice in a row.

Lastday3312:

Killer - Tonight everyone he attacks will have death immune.(Exclude execution)
Offensive - Remove all his passive and occupy him tonight.(Include Occupy and redirection immune)
Investgative - The investigative result will shown as framed tonight.
Support - Will -1 random limited ability,If there isn’t have one,Occupy him instead.
Social - The player can’t speak,talk,vote,use any ability in tomorrow.

Killer - If they attack tonight, their target will be granted death immunity.
Offensive - Remove all of their passives, and occupy them tonight.
Investgative - Their results for tonight will be Framed
Support - Lose 1 use(/charge, whichever one you want) of a random ability. If there are none to chose from, Occupy them instead.
Social - They cannot use any day abilities, talk, or vote tommorow.

Lastday3312:

Flreball(2 charges) - Attack a player.

Flreball(2 charges) - Attack a player.

Lastday3312:

Goal:Win with only neutral players.

Goal: Defeat the Blue Dragon and the Cult/Unseen.

Read full topic

item.title: The Witch - Neutral Special(Unique)
item.dc:creator: Lastday3312
item.description:
The Witch - Neutral Special(Unique)

(Passives)
Forgotten Magic - After death, you can use one more debuff/Fireball at night, if you have one.

(Day ability)
Confusion(2 Charges) - Prevent a player from making day abilities today. You can only target a player once.

(Night ability)

Debuff(Inf Charges) - Debuff a player depending on their class type. You cannot the same person twice in a row.

Killer - If they attack tonight, their target will be granted death immunity.
Offensive - Remove all of their passives, and occupy them tonight.
Investgative - Their results for tonight will be Framed
Support - Lose 1 Charge of a random ability. If there are none to chose from, Occupy them instead.
Social - They cannot use any day abilities, talk, or vote tommorow.

Flreball(2 charges) - Attack a player.

Goal: Defeat the Blue Dragon and the Cult/Unseen.

Thanks for Bad English edit

Read full topic
